ygData.subject: Exception when trying to configure the scope
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I am attempting to modify the scope rules in a sheet in one of my profiles, and am receiving this exception when clicking on add : Problem:

Hello,

I am attempting to modify the scope rules in a sheet in one of my
profiles, and am receiving this exception when clicking on "add':

Problem: org.archive.settings.path.InvalidPathException: root alters a
key for a nonexistent map at root

Any help?

Jean-Noel
